English Query: Could you provide the description of the faculty named X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم وصف للكلية التي تدعى X؟
SQL Query: SELECT description FROM faculty WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the description of the faculty with symbol X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم وصف للكلية التي لها الرمز X؟
SQL Query: SELECT description FROM faculty WHERE symbol = 'X';

English Query: What is the symbol associated with the faculty named X?
Arabic Query: ما هو الرمز المرتبط بالكلية التي تدعى X؟
SQL Query: SELECT symbol FROM faculty WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Could you tell me the name of the dean of the faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك أن تخبرني بإسم عميد الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.name_arabic FROM faculty f JOIN instructor i ON f.dean_id = i.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the email of the dean of faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم البريد الإلكتروني لعميد الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.email FROM faculty f JOIN instructor i ON f.dean_id = i.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the phone number of the dean of faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم رقم الهاتف لعميد الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.phone_number FROM faculty f JOIN instructor i ON f.dean_id = i.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the office hours of the dean of faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم الساعات المكتبية لعميد الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.office_hours FROM faculty f JOIN instructor i ON f.dean_id = i.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the Ritaj ID of the dean of faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم ID ريتاج لعميد الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.ritaj_id FROM faculty f JOIN instructor i ON f.dean_id = i.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you tell me the department of the dean of the faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك أن تخبرني ما هي الدائرة التي يتبع لها عميد الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT d.name_arabic FROM faculty f JOIN instructor i ON f.dean_id = i.id JOIN department d ON i.department_id = d.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide a list of departments in the faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة الدوائر الأكاديمية في الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT d.name_arabic FROM department d JOIN faculty f ON d.faculty_id = f.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide a list of majors in the faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT m.name_arabic FROM major m JOIN department d ON m.department_id = d.id JOIN faculty f ON d.faculty_id = f.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide a list of instructors in the faculty X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالدكتورين في الكلية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.name_arabic FROM instructor i JOIN department d ON i.department_id = d.id JOIN faculty f ON d.faculty_id = f.id WHERE f.name_arabic = 'X' OR f.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the description of the department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم وصف للدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT description FROM department WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the description of the department named X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم وصف للدائرة التي تدعي (اسمها) X؟
SQL Query: SELECT description FROM department WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the symbol associated with the department named X?
Arabic Query: ما هو الرمز المرتبط بالدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT symbol FROM department WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you tell me the name of the head of the department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك أن تخبرني بإسم رئيس الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.name_arabic FROM department d JOIN instructor i ON d.head_instructor_id = i.id WHERE d.name_arabic = 'X' OR d.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the email of the head of department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم البريد الإلكتروني لرئيس الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.email FROM department d JOIN instructor i ON d.head_instructor_id = i.id WHERE d.name_arabic = 'X' OR d.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the phone number of the head of department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم رقم الهاتف لرئيس الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.phone_number FROM department d JOIN instructor i ON d.head_instructor_id = i.id WHERE d.name_arabic = 'X' OR d.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the office hours of the head of department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم الساعات المكتبية لرئيس الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.office_hours FROM department d JOIN instructor i ON d.head_instructor_id = i.id WHERE d.name_arabic = 'X' OR d.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide the Ritaj ID of the head of department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم ID ريتاج لرئيس الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.ritaj_id FROM department d JOIN instructor i ON d.head_instructor_id = i.id WHERE d.name_arabic = 'X' OR d.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you tell me the faculty of the department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك أن تخبرني عن الكلية التي تتبع لها الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT f.name_arabic FROM department d JOIN faculty f ON d.faculty_id = f.id WHERE d.name_arabic = 'X' OR d.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide a list of majors in the department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT m.name_arabic FROM major m JOIN department d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE d.name_arabic = 'X' OR d.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide a list of instructors in the department X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالدكتورين في الدائرة الأكاديمية X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.name_arabic FROM instructor i WHERE i.department_id IN (SELECT id FROM department WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X');

English Query: Could you provide the description of the major named X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم وصف للتخصص الذي يدعى X؟
SQL Query: SELECT description FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X';

English Query: What is the symbol associated with the major named X?
Arabic Query: ما هو الرمز المرتبط بالتخصص الذي يدعى X؟
SQL Query: SELECT symbol FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the total number of hours for the major X?
Arabic Query: ما هو إجمالي عدد الساعات للتخصص X؟
SQL Query: SELECT hours FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X';

English Query: What department does the major X belong to?
Arabic Query: إلى أي دائرة ينتمي التخصص X؟
SQL Query: SELECT d.name_arabic FROM major m JOIN department d ON m.department_id = d.id WHERE m.name_arabic = 'X' OR m.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses (with thier details) in the major X, sorted by symbol?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بمساقات التخصص X مرتبة حسب الرمز مع التفاصيل الخاصة بكل مساق
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic, c.symbol, c.description, c.credits FROM course c WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') ORDER BY c.symbol;

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X that are taught by the instructor Y?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X التي يدرسها الدكتور Y؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN instructor_course ic ON c.id = ic.course_id JOIN instructor i ON ic.instructor_id = i.id WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND (i.name_arabic = 'Y' OR i.symbol = 'Y');

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X that are taught by the teaching assistant Y?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X التي يدرسها المساعد Y؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN ta_course tac ON c.id = tac.course_id JOIN teaching_assistant ta ON tac.ta_id = ta.id WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND (ta.name_arabic = 'Y' OR ta.symbol = 'Y');

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X that have the course Y as a prerequisite?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X التي تتطلب المساق Y كشرط مسبق؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN course_prerequisite cp ON c.id = cp.course_id WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND cp.prerequisite_id IN (SELECT id FROM course WHERE name_arabic = 'Y' OR symbol = 'Y');

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X that have the course Y as a prerequisite and are taught by the instructor Z?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X التي تتطلب المساق Y كشرط مسبق ويدرسها الدكتور Z؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN course_prerequisite cp ON c.id = cp.course_id JOIN instructor_course ic ON c.id = ic.course_id JOIN instructor i ON ic.instructor_id = i.id WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND cp.prerequisite_id IN (SELECT id FROM course WHERE name_arabic = 'Y' OR symbol = 'Y') AND (i.name_arabic = 'Z' OR i.symbol = 'Z');

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X that have the course Y as a prerequisite and are taught by the teaching assistant Z?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X التي تتطلب المساق Y كشرط مسبق ويدرسها المساعد Z؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN course_prerequisite cp ON c.id = cp.course_id JOIN ta_course tac ON c.id = tac.course_id JOIN teaching_assistant ta ON tac.ta_id = ta.id WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND cp.prerequisite_id IN (SELECT id FROM course WHERE name_arabic = 'Y' OR symbol = 'Y') AND (ta.name_arabic = 'Z' OR ta.symbol = 'Z');

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X that have the course Y as a prerequisite and are taught by both the instructor Z and the teaching assistant W?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X التي تتطلب المساق Y كشرط مسبق ويدرسها الدكتور Z والمساعد W؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN course_prerequisite cp ON c.id = cp.course_id JOIN instructor_course ic ON c.id = ic.course_id JOIN instructor i ON ic.instructor_id = i.id JOIN ta_course tac ON c.id = tac.course_id JOIN teaching_assistant ta ON tac.ta_id = ta.id WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND cp.prerequisite_id IN (SELECT id FROM course WHERE name_arabic = 'Y' OR symbol = 'Y') AND (i.name_arabic = 'Z' OR i.symbol = 'Z') AND (ta.name_arabic = 'W' OR ta.symbol = 'W');

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X where their credits are greater than or equal to Y?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X حيث تكون الساعات المعتمدة لها أكبر من أو تساوي Y؟
SQL Query: SELECT name_arabic FROM course WHERE major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND credits >= Y;

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X where their credits are less than or equal to Y?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X حيث تكون الساعات المعتمدة لها أقل من أو تساوي Y؟
SQL Query: SELECT name_arabic FROM course WHERE major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND credits <= Y;

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X where their credits are greater than or equal to Y and less than or equal to Z?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X حيث تكون الساعات المعتمدة لها أكبر من أو تساوي Y وأقل من أو تساوي Z؟
SQL Query: SELECT name_arabic FROM course WHERE major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND credits >= Y AND credits <= Z;

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X where their credits are greater than or equal to Y and less than or equal to Z, and are taught by the instructor W?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X حيث تكون الساعات المعتمدة لها أكبر من أو تساوي Y وأقل من أو تساوي Z، ويدرسها الدكتور W؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN instructor_course ic ON c.id = ic.course_id JOIN instructor i ON ic.instructor_id = i.id WHERE c.major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND c.credits >= Y AND c.credits <= Z AND (i.name_arabic = 'W' OR i.symbol = 'W');

English Query: Could you provide a list of courses in the major X where their credits are equal to Y?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساقات في التخصص X حيث تكون الساعات المعتمدة لها تساوي Y؟
SQL Query: SELECT name_arabic FROM course WHERE major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X') AND credits = Y;

English Query: Could you provide a list of instructors in the major X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالدكاترة في التخصص X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.name_arabic FROM instructor i JOIN department d ON i.department_id = d.id WHERE d.id IN (SELECT department_id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X');

English Query: Could you provide a list of teaching assistants in the major X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم قائمة بالمساعدين في التخصص X؟
SQL Query: SELECT ta.name_arabic FROM teaching_assistant ta JOIN department d ON ta.department_id = d.id WHERE d.id IN (SELECT department_id FROM major WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X');

English Query: Can you provide me with the description of the course X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم وصف للمساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT description FROM course WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X';

English Query: What is the symbol of the course X?
Arabic Query: ما هو رمز المساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT symbol FROM course WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the name of the course X?
Arabic Query: ما هو اسم المساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT name_arabic FROM course WHERE symbol = 'X';

English Query: How many credits does the course X have?
Arabic Query: كم عدد الساعات المعتمدة للمساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT credits FROM course WHERE name_arabic = 'X' OR symbol = 'X';

English Query: What are the prerequisites for the course X?
Arabic Query: ما هي المتطلبات السابقة للمساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT cp.prerequisite_id FROM course_prerequisite cp JOIN course c ON cp.course_id = c.id WHERE c.name_arabic = 'X' OR c.symbol = 'X';

English Query: What is the major of the course X?
Arabic Query: لأي تخصص يتبع المساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT m.name_arabic FROM major m JOIN course c ON m.id = c.major_id WHERE c.name_arabic = 'X' OR c.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Which department does the course X belong to?
Arabic Query: إلى أي دائرة ينتمي المساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT d.name_arabic FROM department d JOIN major m ON d.id = m.department_id JOIN course c ON m.id = c.major_id WHERE c.name_arabic = 'X' OR c.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Who are the instructors for the course X?
Arabic Query: من هم المدرسين للمساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT i.name_arabic FROM instructor i JOIN instructor_course ic ON i.id = ic.instructor_id JOIN course c ON ic.course_id = c.id WHERE c.name_arabic = 'X' OR c.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Who are the teaching assistants for the course X?
Arabic Query: من هم المساعدين للمساق X؟
SQL Query: SELECT ta.name_arabic FROM teaching_assistant ta JOIN ta_course tac ON ta.id = tac.ta_id JOIN course c ON tac.course_id = c.id WHERE c.name_arabic = 'X' OR c.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Which courses have course X as a prerequisite?
Arabic Query: ما هي المساقات تتطلب المساق X كمتطلب سابق؟
SQL Query: SELECT c2.name_arabic FROM course c1 JOIN course_prerequisite cp ON c1.id = cp.course_id JOIN course c2 ON cp.prerequisite_id = c2.id WHERE c1.name_arabic = 'X' OR c1.symbol = 'X';

English Query: Can you provide me with the phone number of the instructor X?
Arabic Query: هل يمكنك تقديم رقم الهاتف للدكتور X؟
SQL Query: SELECT phone_number FROM instructor WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the email address of the instructor X?
Arabic Query: ما هو عنوان البريد الإلكتروني للدكتور X؟
SQL Query: SELECT email FROM instructor WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the ritaj id of the instructor X?
Arabic Query: ما هو الرقم الخاص بالدكتور X في ريتاج؟
SQL Query: SELECT ritaj_id FROM instructor WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What are the office hours for the instructor X?
Arabic Query: ما هي الساعات المكتبية للدكتور X؟
SQL Query: SELECT office_hours FROM instructor WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which department does the instructor X belong to?
Arabic Query: إلى أي دائرة ينتمي الدكتور X؟
SQL Query: SELECT d.name_arabic FROM department d JOIN instructor i ON d.id = i.department_id WHERE i.name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which faculty does the instructor X belong to?
Arabic Query: إلى أي كلية ينتمي الدكتور X؟
SQL Query: SELECT f.name_arabic FROM faculty f JOIN department d ON f.id = d.faculty_id JOIN instructor i ON d.id = i.department_id WHERE i.name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which courses does the instructor X teach?
Arabic Query: ما هي المساقات التي يدرسها الدكتور X؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN instructor_course ic ON c.id = ic.course_id JOIN instructor i ON ic.instructor_id = i.id WHERE i.name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which faculty is the instructor X the dean of?
Arabic Query: ما هي الكلية التي يشغل فيها الدكتور X منصب العميد؟
SQL Query: SELECT f.name_arabic FROM faculty f JOIN instructor i ON f.dean_id = i.id WHERE i.name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which department is the instructor X the head of?
Arabic Query: ما هي الدائرة التي يشغل فيها الدكتور X منصب رئيس الدائرة
SQL Query: SELECT d.name_arabic FROM department d JOIN instructor i ON d.head_instructor_id = i.id WHERE i.name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the phone number of the teaching assistant X?
Arabic Query: ما هو رقم الهاتف للمساعد X؟
SQL Query: SELECT phone_number FROM teaching_assistant WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the email address of the teaching assistant X?
Arabic Query: ما هو البريد الإلكتروني للمساعد X؟
SQL Query: SELECT email FROM teaching_assistant WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: What is the ritaj id of the teaching assistant X?
Arabic Query: ما هو رقم المساعد X في ريتاج؟
SQL Query: SELECT ritaj_id FROM teaching_assistant WHERE name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which department does the teaching assistant X belong to?
Arabic Query: إلى أي دائرة ينتمي المساعد X؟
SQL Query: SELECT d.name_arabic FROM department d JOIN teaching_assistant ta ON d.id = ta.department_id WHERE ta.name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which courses does the teaching assistant X assist with?
Arabic Query: ما هي المساقات التي يساعد فيها المساعد X؟
SQL Query: SELECT c.name_arabic FROM course c JOIN ta_course tc ON c.id = tc.course_id JOIN teaching_assistant ta ON tc.ta_id = ta.id WHERE ta.name_arabic = 'X';

English Query: Which faculty has the most departments?
Arabic Query: أي كلية لديها العدد الأكبر من الدوائر؟
SQL Query: SELECT faculty.id, faculty.name_english, COUNT(department.id) as num_departments FROM faculty LEFT JOIN department ON department.faculty_id = faculty.id GROUP BY faculty.id, faculty.name_english ORDER BY num_departments DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: How many departments are there in each faculty?
Arabic Query: كم عدد الدوائر في كل كلية؟
SQL Query: SELECT faculty.id, faculty.name_english, COUNT(department.id) as num_departments FROM faculty LEFT JOIN department ON department.faculty_id = faculty.id GROUP BY faculty.id, faculty.name_english;

English Query: How many courses are there in each major?
Arabic Query: كم عدد المساقات في كل تخصص؟
SQL Query: SELECT major.id, major.name_english, COUNT(course.id) as num_courses FROM major LEFT JOIN course ON course.major_id = major.id GROUP BY major.id, major.name_english;

English Query: Which faculty has the most number of courses?
Arabic Query: أي كلية لديها العدد الأكبر من المساقات؟
SQL Query: SELECT faculty.id, faculty.name_english, COUNT(course.id) as num_courses FROM faculty JOIN department ON faculty.id = department.faculty_id JOIN major ON department.id = major.department_id JOIN course ON major.id = course.major_id GROUP BY faculty.id, faculty.name_english ORDER BY num_courses DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which department has the most teaching assistants?
Arabic Query: أي دائرة لديها العدد الأكبر من المساعدين؟
SQL Query: SELECT department.id, department.name_english, COUNT(teaching_assistant.id) as num_tas FROM department LEFT JOIN teaching_assistant ON teaching_assistant.department_id = department.id GROUP BY department.id, department.name_english ORDER BY num_tas DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which course has the most prerequisites?
Arabic Query: أي مساق لديها العدد الأكبر من المتطلبات السابقة؟
SQL Query: SELECT course.id, course.name_english, COUNT(course_prerequisite.prerequisite_id) as num_prerequisites FROM course LEFT JOIN course_prerequisite ON course_prerequisite.course_id = course.id GROUP BY course.id, course.name_english ORDER BY num_prerequisites DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Who is the instructor that teaches the least number of courses?
Arabic Query: من هو الدكتور الذي يعلم أقل عدد من المساقات
SQL Query: SELECT instructor.id, instructor.name_english, COUNT(instructor_course.course_id) as num_courses FROM instructor LEFT JOIN instructor_course ON instructor.id = instructor_course.instructor_id GROUP BY instructor.id, instructor.name_english ORDER BY num_courses ASC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which faculty has the least number of departments?
Arabic Query: أي كلية لديها العدد الأقل من الدوائر؟
SQL Query: SELECT faculty.id, faculty.name_english, COUNT(department.id) as num_departments FROM faculty LEFT JOIN department ON department.faculty_id = faculty.id GROUP BY faculty.id, faculty.name_english ORDER BY num_departments ASC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which courses do not have a teaching assistant?
Arabic Query: أي المساقات التي لا يوجد لديها مساعد تدريس؟
SQL Query: SELECT * FROM course WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT course_id FROM ta_course);

English Query: Which instructors have 'Mohamed' in their name?
Arabic Query: أي الدكاترة لديهم 'محمد' في اسمهم؟
SQL Query: SELECT * FROM instructor WHERE name_arabic LIKE '%Mohamed%' OR name_english LIKE '%Mohamed%';

English Query: Which course has the most teaching assistants?
Arabic Query: أي مساق لديه العدد الأكبر من مساعدي التدريس؟
SQL Query: SELECT course_id, COUNT(ta_id) as num_tas FROM ta_course GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_tas DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which faculty has the least number of instructors?
Arabic Query: أي كلية لديها العدد الأقل من الدكاترة؟
SQL Query: SELECT faculty.id, faculty.name_english, COUNT(instructor.id) as num_instructors FROM faculty JOIN department ON faculty.id = department.faculty_id JOIN instructor ON department.id = instructor.department_id GROUP BY faculty.id, faculty.name_english ORDER BY num_instructors ASC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which major offers the least number of courses?
Arabic Query: أي تخصص يقدم العدد الأقل من المساقات
SQL Query: SELECT major.id, major.name_english, COUNT(course.id) as num_courses FROM major LEFT JOIN course ON course.major_id = major.id GROUP BY major.id, major.name_english ORDER BY num_courses ASC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which department has the most courses with at least one prerequisite?
Arabic Query: أي دائرة لديها العدد الأكبر من المساقات التي لديها متطلب سابق واحد على الأقل؟
SQL Query: SELECT department.id, department.name_english, COUNT(DISTINCT course.id) as num_courses FROM department JOIN major ON department.id = major.department_id JOIN course ON major.id = course.id JOIN course_prerequisite ON course.id = course_prerequisite.course_id GROUP BY department.id, department.name_english ORDER BY num_courses DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which faculty has the most courses with at least 3 credits?
Arabic Query: أي كلية لديها العدد الأكبر من المساقات التي بها 3 ساعات على الأقل؟
SQL Query: SELECT faculty.id, faculty.name_english, COUNT(course.id) as num_courses FROM faculty JOIN department ON faculty.id = department.faculty_id JOIN major ON department.id = major.department_id JOIN course ON major.id = course.id WHERE course.credits >= 3 GROUP BY faculty.id, faculty.name_english ORDER BY num_courses DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Who is the instructor that teaches the most number of courses?
Arabic Query: من هو الدكتور الذي يدرس أكبر عدد من المساقات؟
SQL Query: SELECT TOP 1 instructor_id, COUNT(course_id) AS NumCourses FROM instructor_course GROUP BY instructor_id ORDER BY NumCourses DESC;

English Query: Which department offers the most courses?
Arabic Query: أي دائرة تقدم أكبر عدد من المساقات؟
SQL Query: SELECT department.id, department.name_english, COUNT(course.id) AS NumCourses FROM department JOIN major ON department.id = major.department_id JOIN course ON major.id = course.major_id GROUP BY department.id, department.name_english ORDER BY NumCourses DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which department has the highest average course credits?
Arabic Query: أي دائرة لديها أعلى متوسط لعدد الساعات المعتمدة للمساقات؟
SQL Query: SELECT department.id, department.name_english, AVG(course.credits) AS AvgCredits FROM department JOIN major ON department.id = major.department_id JOIN course ON major.id = course.major_id GROUP BY department.id, department.name_english ORDER BY AvgCredits DESC LIMIT 1;

English Query: Which department has the least hours in their majors?
Arabic Query: أي دائرة لديها أقل ساعات في تخصصاته؟
SQL Query: SELECT department.id, department.name_english, MIN(major.hours) AS MinHours FROM department JOIN major ON department.id = major.department_id GROUP BY department.id, department.name_english;

English Query: How many instructors are in each department?
Arabic Query: كم عدد الدكاترة في كل دائرة؟
SQL Query: SELECT department.id, department.name_english, COUNT(instructor.id) AS NumInstructors FROM department LEFT JOIN instructor ON department.id = instructor.department_id GROUP BY department.id, department.name_english;

English Query: Which instructors have 'edu' in their email?
Arabic Query: أي الدكاترة لديهم 'edu' في بريدهم الإلكتروني؟
SQL Query: SELECT * FROM instructor WHERE email LIKE '%edu%';

English Query: Which courses are taught by instructors from the 'Computer Science' department?
Arabic Query: أي المساقات التي يتم تدريسها بواسطة دكاترة من قسم 'علم الحاسوب'؟
SQL Query: SELECT course.* FROM course JOIN major ON course.major_id = major.id JOIN department ON major.department_id = department.id WHERE department.name_english IN ('Computer Science');

English Query: Which courses have either 'CS' or 'Math' in their symbols?
Arabic Query: أي المساقات لديها إما 'CS' أو 'Math' في رموزها؟
SQL Query: SELECT * FROM course WHERE symbol LIKE '%CS%' OR symbol LIKE '%Math%';
